message: i want to creat a magazine like THE DAILY magazine for iPad
There's this, http://bakerframework.com/  I know there's another HTML only framework but I can't seem to find it anywhere.

I think there are at least two apps for making iPad mags, apart from the usual Xcode and InDesign approach. One is coming from Aquafadas, the other from ...argh, don't seem to remember right now, but I bet it's easily googlable. Oh and then there's that Adobe package, too. That is, apart from those links mentioned above.
Check out Google's "Think Quarterly" for an awesome example of a beautifully designed, cross platform online magazine. http://on.mash.to/gtRrRu

I haven't used this (and have no affiliation with them) but Mag+ looks pretty cool. A bit pricey, maybe, at $2500, it has been used for the iPad versions of Popular Science and Popular Photography, amongst others. Their website is http://www.magplus.com . Let us know what you decide on. I'm curious to know more about this subject too.
